title: Transfering from Garena to OCE
body: Is this event happening again this year. I have an account in Garena and I'd like to move it here

replies.body:
What event?
Are you thinking about the Beta event when the server was created and people were given free transfer and Pool Party Ziggs?
Sorry mate it's a one time thing only, the server wont suddenly be going into beta again.

Should have transfered when it was free.
